channel.title: Complains on Henrique Dias
channel.description: Recent content in Complains on Henrique Dias

item.title: Stop complaining. Do!
item.author: hacdias@gmail.com (Henrique Dias)
item.description: Everyday I hear people complaining here and there. They complain about almost everything: from the pencil which isn’t on its place to the government’s rules. I think is doesn’t occurs only here, of course. Maybe it’s a problem of adults (some of them, no offense). I see them complaining every single second. If you’re not this type of person, I believe you should have seen some of them. Complaining does:
